list1_SourceName.SourceName: Source Emissions | Building AC- R410A

Source Emissions | Natural Gas Combustion Water-source heat pumps connected to recycled water reservoir and admin building eliminate natural gas bill completely. We still have the PG&E meter in case the system malfunctions. Still some fugitive emission here.
